original_text: At that time Eli, whose eyesight had begun to grow dim so that he could not see, was lying down in his own place.
korean_text: 엘리의 눈이 점점 어두워 가서 잘 보지 못하는 그 때에 그가 자기 처소에 누웠고

sentences.original_text: whose eyesight had begun to grow dim
so that he could not see,
was lying down in his own place.
